query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) NOT NULL, [LineNumber] int not null, [RegistrationDate] datetime null, [RegistrationNumber] nvarchar(max) null, [PreparedByName] nvarchar(max) null, [PreparedByDepartmentShortName] nvarchar(max) null, [PreparedByDepartmentName] nvarchar(max) null, [Subject] nvarchar(max) NULL, [CanRead] bit not null)
query.postgres: create table {0} (ReportSessionId varchar(256) NOT NULL, LineNumber integer not null, RegistrationDate timestamp null, RegistrationNumber citext null, PreparedByName citext null, PreparedByDepartmentShortName citext null, PreparedByDepartmentName citext null, Subject citext NULL, CanRead boolean not null);

query.default: select RegistrationDate, RegistrationNumber, PreparedByName, PreparedByDepartmentShortName, PreparedByDepartmentName, Subject, CanRead from Sungero_Reports_InternalDocuments where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by LineNumber;
